unittitle.title: Hot Wire: The Journal of Women's Music and Culture

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes January 1991 issue of Hotwire with an article on the Reel World String Band trio and WominSounds, a radio show co-hosted by Bev Futrell and Karen Jones on WEKU-FM. Also includes letters from 1990-1991 by Hotwire publisher Toni Armstrong, Jr.
